headline: EV Pickups Are a Bust for US Carmakers
summary: It's not just Tesla struggling to sell its Cybertruck. Ford, General Motors and Rivian have had a hard time convincing US customers to buy electric pick-up trucks. Bloomberg's Detroit Bureau Chief David Welch explains why.

raw.headline: EV Pickups Are a Bust for US Carmakers
raw.summary: It's not just Tesla struggling to sell its Cybertruck. Ford, General Motors and Rivian have had a hard time convincing US customers to buy electric pick-up trucks. Bloomberg's Detroit Bureau Chief David Welch explains why.

headline: Electrify Expo Announces First Ever Industry Day in New York on October 17 with Impressive Speaker Lineup Including Lucid, Ford, Kia, GM, BMW, Michelin and many more

headline: Half of companies increasing prices in response to tariffs

headline: Vietnam Tire Market Forecast: USD 4.28 Billion by 2030, Driven by Local Automotive Expansion
summary: Vietnam's tire market presents opportunities through rising vehicle production, supported by increased foreign investments and domestic car manufacturing growth. Vietnam's strategic advantage in rubber production and favorable government policies further enhance its position as a manufacturing hub. Emerging trends like smart tires cater to tech-savvy consumers, boosting demand. headline: Bank of America Securities Reiterated a Buy Rating on Ford Motor Company (F), Kept the PT Unchanged
